subject: Mathematics
title: GCD & LCM
description: The greatest common divisor and least common multiple are two important and frequently referenced concepts in number theory. Most people learn about these concepts in elementary school, but not everyone is aware of how to calculate them be appealing to prime factorization.
objectives: Understand the definition of LCM and GCD
Learn how to calculate LCM and GCD using prime factorization
Know how to use LCM and GCD in real-world applications
